item.title: [Introduction to Python] Basic usage of lambda expression
item.description: # Article purpose # The same Python introductory person as myself should understand the basic usage of lambda expression. The other day, my senior asked me about the use of lambda expressions, but I didn’t use them very much and I couldn’t answer them well, so I investigated and summarized them. At that time, I referred to the following sites. Or rather, this article is for organizing my thoughts, so I think it is easier to see the linked article.
